story.text: Wanna work together? Contact me now!

education.title: FII Practic React Training
education.text: The FII Practic project is a perfect opportunity to learn in a friendly environment because it not only facilitates the professional development of young IT enthusiasts but also their personal development. There are many advantages that participants can benefit from in these sessions: establishing contact with companies and trainers, learning the steps to building a successful career, deepening or learning some key concepts for the future. I highly recommend it
